title: P06-3007

sentences.text: We investigate independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches .
In this paper , events are defined as event terms and associated event elements .
With independent approach , we identify important contents by frequency of events .
With relevant approach , we identify important contents by PageRank algorithm on the event map constructed from documents .

Entity-with_relevant_approach__we_identi.label: With relevant approach, we identify important contents by PageRank algorithm on the event map constructed from documents
aliases: With relevant approach, we identify important contents by PageRank algorithm on the event map constructed from documents
Entity-with_relevant_approach__we_identi.description: A methodology for identifying important content in an event-based extractive summarization framework using PageRank algorithm and an event map constructed from documents.

mentions.local_name: With relevant approach, we identify important contents by PageRank algorithm on the event map constructed from documents

Entity-with_independent_approach__we_ide.description: The methodology used for identifying key content in event-based extractive summarization

mentions.local_name: With independent approach, we identify important contents by frequency of events

Entity-independent_and_relevant_event-ba.label: independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches
aliases: independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches
Entity-independent_and_relevant_event-ba.description: A set of techniques for automatically generating summaries from multiple documents, which involve identifying important contents based on frequency or relevance analysis.

mentions.local_name: independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches

Entity-with_relevant_approach.label: With relevant approach
Entity-with_relevant_approach.description: An approach that identifies important content in a document summary using the PageRank algorithm applied to an event map constructed from multiple documents.

Entity-we_investigate.label: We investigate
Entity-we_investigate.description: Independent and relevant event-based extractive multi-document summarization approaches

Entity-the_event_map_constructed_from_do.label: the event map constructed from documents
aliases: the event map constructed from documents
Entity-the_event_map_constructed_from_do.description: A graph-based representation of events extracted and organized from multiple documents, used as input for PageRank algorithm in relevant approach of event- based extractive multi-document summarization.

Entity-we_identify_important_content_by_.description: A methodology for identifying important content in a document summarization task based on the frequency of events.

Entity-pagerank_algorithm.label: PageRank algorithm
Entity-pagerank_algorithm.description: A widely used computational method for ranking web pages or nodes in a network based on their importance and relevance.

Entity-event_are_defined_a_event_term_an.label: events are defined as event terms and associated event elements
aliases: events are defined as event terms and associated event elements
Entity-event_are_defined_a_event_term_an.description: A conceptual definition of an occurrence or happening that consists of a term describing it and its related components.

Entity-event.label: events
Entity-event.description: A collection of occurrences or happenings that can be described by their characteristics, such as timing, location, participants, and outcomes.

Entity-pagerank.label: PageRank
Entity-pagerank.description: A graph-based ranking algorithm that assigns a score to each node in a network based on its importance and connectivity.

Entity-associated_event_element.label: associated event elements
Entity-associated_event_element.description: The specific components or parts of an event, such as entities involved in the event, locations where the event occurred, and times when the event took place.

Entity-event_term.label: event terms
Entity-event_term.description: A term used to describe or represent an occurrence

Entity-event_map.label: event map
Entity-event_map.description: A graphical or digital representation of events and their relationships

Entity-content.label: contents
Entity-content.description: Information or data that holds significance

Entity-document.label: documents
Entity-document.description: Written records or papers containing information

Entity-independent_approach.label: independent approach
Entity-independent_approach.description: A methodology that operates independently or autonomously.

Entity-frequency_of_event.label: frequency of events
Entity-frequency_of_event.description: A measure or metric used to quantify the number of occurrences or instances of a particular phenomenon

Entity-experimental_result_are_encouragi.label: Experimental results are encouraging
Entity-experimental_result_are_encouragi.description: A positive outcome or conclusion drawn from a scientific experiment

Entity-experimental_result.label: Experimental results
Entity-experimental_result.description: The outcomes or findings of a scientific experiment

Entity-we.label: We
Entity-we.description: A group of researchers or authors

summary: We investigate independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches . In this paper , events are defined as event terms and associated event elements . With independent approach , we identify important contents by frequency of events . With relevant approach , we identify important contents by PageRank algorithm on the event map constructed from documents . Experimental results are encouraging .

Predicate-investigate.label: investigate
Predicate-investigate.description: To investigate means to systematically examine or analyze something (e.g. a phenomenon, an issue, or a method) with the goal of gaining understanding, identifying patterns, or uncovering underlying truths. This predicate connects the subject and object by implying that the subject is actively engaging in a process of inquiry, exploration, or scrutiny to gather information, verify claims, or develop knowledge about the specified topic.

Predicate-are_defined_as.label: are defined as
Predicate-are_defined_as.description: The predicate 'are defined as' establishes a relationship between two concepts where one (the subject) serves as the foundation or basis for defining another (the object). In this sense, it indicates that the object's meaning or scope is derived from or tied to the characteristics of the subject.

Predicate-associated_with.label: associated with
Predicate-associated_with.description: The predicate 'associated with' indicates a connection between two entities where one entity (the subject) has a relationship or attribute that is characterized by another entity (the object). This relationship can be based on various aspects such as categorization, classification, identification, or description.

Predicate-identify_important_contents_by.label: identify important contents by
Predicate-identify_important_contents_by.description: This predicate indicates a method or criterion used to determine what constitutes 'important' content. It connects the subject (the entity performing the identification) with the object (the factor or criteria by which importance is determined), highlighting how the subject approaches identifying important contents.

Predicate-uses.label: uses
Predicate-uses.description: The predicate 'uses' indicates a relationship of utilization or exploitation between the subject and object. It suggests that the subject makes use of, relies on, or employs the object to achieve some purpose or goal.

Predicate-is_used_on_the_event_map_const.label: is used on the event map constructed from documents to identify important contents
Predicate-is_used_on_the_event_map_const.description: This predicate indicates that a given entity (the subject) applies its functionality or properties to an event map derived from textual sources (documents), with the purpose of extracting and highlighting crucial information.

Predicate-identify.label: identify
Predicate-identify.description: To identify means to recognize or determine the existence, nature, or characteristics of something. It involves a process of discernment and classification that connects the subject's perspective with the object being analyzed, often resulting in a clear understanding or categorization.

skos:broader.label: has a broader term
skos:broader.description: The predicate 'has a broader term' indicates that the subject concept is a specific instance or example of a more general category or class denoted by the object. It establishes a relationship between the subject and object, where the subject is a narrower or more detailed representation of the object.
